title: Freezes when i want to update lol client
body:
Hello guys so i deleted league of legends before 4-6 months ... so now i instaled league of legends and when i click on client and its updating and after 10 min it freezes and i cant even turn off that client 
Please help me 
P.S sorry for my bad english because im from 
Lithuania :(( 
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Do you mean that this is happening while you are patching, or while in-game?  Are there any error messages?  Are you on the legacy client?  At what percent are you freezing?
usually it freezes after 20% if i move my mouse or click anything and ive been experiencing this on the updated client

holy crap me too
after trying to reinstall it it takes 700 minutes eta and it freezes and crashes my pc if i try to open google or move the mouse too much
